job_description:

As a Quality Assurance Analyst (Automation), you will be responsible for designing, developing, and executing automated test cases to ensure the quality, performance, and reliability of our software applications. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify defects, validate functionality, and ensure that all deliverables meet the highest quality standards.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Design, develop, and execute automated test cases based on functional and non-functional requirements.
  • Build, maintain, and optimize automation test scripts using tools such as Selenium, Appium, or other relevant frameworks.
  • Identify, document, and track software defects using bug-tracking systems like JIRA or Bugzilla.
  • Work closely with developers, product managers, and other stakeholders to understand project requirements and ensure complete test coverage.
  • Analyze test results, prepare detailed test reports, and communicate findings to the development team.
  • Enhance and maintain automation frameworks and contribute to overall testing process improvements.
  • Stay updated with emerging testing tools, automation technologies, and industry best practices.
  • Participate in Agile/Scrum ceremonies including sprint planning, daily stand-ups, reviews, and retrospectives.

Qualifications:

  • Minimum of 2-4 years of experience in automation testing.
  • Preferred: Immediate Joiners
  • Strong understanding of software testing methodologies, tools, and QA processes.
  • Hands-on experience with automation tools such as Selenium, Appium, or equivalent.
  • Proficiency in programming/scripting languages such as Java, Python, or JavaScript.
  • Experience with API testing tools like Postman or SOAP UI.
  • Familiarity with version control systems such as Git.
  • Knowledge of CI/CD pipelines and tools like Jenkins, Azure DevOps, or similar.

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at careers@techwarelab.com

job_description:
Senior Full-Stack Web Developer

About in-tech:

For over 20 years, in-tech has been a specialist in electronics and software, growing into a dynamic engineering company with approximately 2350 employees globally across 20 project locations in 8 countries. Headquartered in Munich, Germany, in-tech delivers innovative engineering solutions for the automotive, rail, aerospace, defense, and industrial sectors. We foster a flexible, modern work culture that prioritizes work-life balance, encapsulated by our "Orange Spirit" which signifies liveliness, warmth, dynamism, team spirit, fresh ideas, and a positive work culture.

Since 2024, in-tech has been a subsidiary of Infosys Ltd., enhancing our ability to provide comprehensive development, digitalization services, and offshore capabilities.

The Role:

We are seeking an experienced Senior Full-Stack Web Developer with strong expertise in React and Node.js to design and build scalable, high-performing web applications. You will own the end-to-end development process, from architecture and database design to front-end performance and deployment. If you are passionate about joining a growing, dynamic team within a company that values a positive culture and team spirit, we encourage you to apply.

  • Excellent collaboration and communication abilities, enabling effective teamwork across functions.

Apply with Us:

If you possess the required experience, a strong team spirit, and are looking for an excellent workplace, begin your career journey with us.

job_description:
Software Engineer - Wordpress

At Fingent, we believe that technology can make a meaningful difference to the lives around us. The lives of those who use it, the lives of those who build it, and to society at large. We create and provide software which is beautiful, usable and compelling, to solve complex business challenges. We nurture smart people who bring out the best in themselves, their peers, and their clients.

Roles & Responsibilities:

  • 2–4 years professional experience building WordPress websites and plugins.
  • Write “clean”, well-designed code and follow industry best practices.
  • Build and maintain WordPress themes and custom plugins following WordPress coding standards and best practices.
  • Implement new site features, page templates, blocks (Gutenberg), custom post types, taxonomies and REST API endpoints.
  • Debug, profile and optimize performance (database queries, front-end assets, caching strategies).
  • Ensure security best practices: sanitize/escape inputs, correct capability checks, protect against common vulnerabilities.
  • Migrate and upgrade WordPress sites (core, themes, plugins) and resolve related compatibility issues.
  • Integrate WordPress with third-party services (payment gateways, CRMs, analytics, OAuth, etc.).
  • Develop and maintain cutting edge web-based PHP applications on portal plus premium service platforms.
  • Build innovative, state-of-the-art applications and collaborate with the User Experience (UX) team.
  • Participate in the complete web application/product development lifecycle from conceptualization and design to development, deployment, and post-launch support.
  • Use test-driven development and acceptance tests to ensure feature quality.

Skill Sets:

  • Deep knowledge of WordPress core concepts: hooks (actions & filters), template hierarchy, WP_Query, user capabilities, and the options/postmeta system.
  • Strong knowledge of PHP and knowledge of object-oriented PHP programming.
  • Capable of building efficient and reusable PHP modules.
  • Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git.
  • Experience creating/referencing custom post types, taxonomies, shortcodes, and custom Gutenberg blocks.
  • Practical experience with the WordPress REST API and building/consuming JSON endpoints.
  • Familiar with caching strategies (object cache, page cache, CDN) and basic server concepts.
  • Should have experience in PHP, Laravel/Symfony, MySQL/Postgresql.
  • Solid knowledge in all phases of the software development lifecycle.
  • Proficient in JavaScript, JQuery, HTML5 and CSS.
  • Excellent relational database skills with MySQL.
  • Experience with building RESTful JSON web services.

Nice-to-have:

  • Experience with headless WordPress (WP as a CMS serving APIs) and frameworks like Next.js.
  • Experience with Docker, Kubernetes, or deploying on cloud platforms.
  • Experience writing unit/integration tests for WordPress (PHPUnit, WP-CLI testing).
  • Experience with WooCommerce customizations and hooks.
  • Familiarity with Composer, PSR standards and modern PHP tooling.

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at careers@fingent.com
summary: WordPress developer with 2-4 years experience building websites and plugins. Responsibilities include coding, debugging, performance optimization, and security best practices. Requires strong PHP, JS, and Git skills.

job_description:

We help organizations work smarter and grow faster by enabling their digital transformation initiatives. Our mission is to serve as a catalyst of digital transformation for our clients.

Details: * Designation: Power BI Developer * Qualification: B. Tech * Experience: 4-6 Years * Location: Infopark, Phase 2, Jyothirmaya Building, 1st Floor, Kakkanad * Remuneration: Salary is negotiable and will be the best in the industry.

Role Description: * Understand business requirements in the BI context and design data models to convert raw data into meaningful insights. * Create dashboards and visually interactive reports using Power BI. * Identify Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) with clear objectives and monitor them consistently. * Analyze data and present it through reports that aid in decision-making. * Convert business requirements into technical specifications and determine task timelines. * Design, develop, and deploy Power BI scripts and perform efficient detailed analysis. * Perform DAX queries and functions in Power BI. * Create charts and document data with explanations of algorithms, parameters, models, and relations. * Perform SQL querying for optimal results. * Utilize filters and graphs for enhanced data understanding. * Define and design new systems by analyzing current ETL processes. * Implement technical changes to existing BI systems to improve their functionality.

Non-technical (Soft) Skills: * Ability to interact effectively with both business and technical teams. * Comprehensive knowledge of data design, data modeling, data management, and data visualization. * Strong communication and client management skills. * Stay updated with advancements and best practices in design and development. * Document processes, models, designs, and solutions, and be able to explain and discuss them with the team. * Apply learned lessons to future solution considerations. * Analytical mindset with a problem-solving approach. * Ability to work in an agile environment with a focus on continuous improvement. * Self-motivated and eager to learn.

Skills and Experience: * Excellent knowledge of Power BI & related tools (PBI Desktop & Service, Tabular Editor, DAX Studio, etc.). * Very good data transformation skills using ETL tools (Azure Data Factory, SQL Server SSIS, PowerQuery, Informatica, Databricks experience would be an asset). * Solid working knowledge of SQL and relational databases (ideally MS SQL or Azure Synapse Analytics). * Hands-on working experience in a CI/CD-supported Azure data warehouse environment. * Familiarity with iterative development & Agile concepts and the ability to adapt to changing requirements. * Strong self-motivation and problem-solving skills with a sense of ownership and delivery focus. * Strong written and verbal communication skills. * The ability to translate information simply and clearly to business stakeholders. * Proven experience as a Power BI Developer or in a similar role. * Strong understanding of Power BI, including Power Query, DAX, and visualization best practices. * Hands-on experience with database management systems like SQL Server or other relational databases.

Technical Skills: * Proficiency in Microsoft Power BI Desktop and Power BI Service. * Knowledge of ETL processes and tools. * Familiarity with other BI tools (e.g., Tableau, Qlik) is a plus. * Experience with programming languages like Python or R is advantageous.

Contact: If interested, please share your updated resume to hr@idatalytics.com

Thanks and regards, HR Team If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at hr@idatalytics.com.

Required Skills:

  • Experience in API automation testing using either Restassure (Java) or JavaScript-based frameworks (WebdriverIO/Playwright).
  • Familiarity with CI/CD tools such as Jenkins, GitLab CI, or GitHub Actions.
  • Solid grasp of Agile methodologies and working in a Scrum team.

Location: Kochi / Bangalore Notice Period: Immediate to less than 30 Days

  • AWS (S3, EC2, RDS, Lambda, ECS/EKS, VPC, ELB, Route 53, CloudWatch, CloudTrail, Event Bridge)

  • Conduct API Automation using tools such as Restassure or WebdriverIO/Playwright and validate backend services.
  • Create detailed, comprehensive, and well-structured test plans and test cases.
  • Troubleshoot issues, identify root causes, and ensure high quality across all releases.

Location:

Kochi / Bangalore

Notice Period:

Immediate to less than 30 Days

Preferred Skills & Experience:

  • 6+ Years & 10+ years

Required Skills:

  • Extensive experience (4+ years) in test automation with proven expertise in at least one of the following stacks:

  • JavaScript with WebdriverIO or Playwright
